headline.main: Afghan War Divides Rome Into Two Rallies

lead_paragraph: A huge ''U.S.A. Day'' pageant starring Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi brought tens of thousands of people into the Piazza del Popolo tonight without provoking the violence that many had feared. The air was tense because a similar number of antiwar marchers were demonstrating at the same time, right across town.
abstract: Huge USA Day pageant starring Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi brings tens of thousands of Romans into Piazza del Popola, even as antiwar protesters across town denounce US bombing of Afghanistan; photo of pro-American rally (S)
